title: Lets talk about Riots "Match Making" system
body: it is absolutely 100% unfair for a sub level 30 to get matched with anyone above gold let alone diamond. https://imgur.com/43edNgt , https://imgur.com/1uRg0J5 , These are just 2 examples of game simply lost because im a fucking lvl 25 !! i should be placed with players of my elo and experience this simply is just 100% unfair.

replies.body: But maybe the level 25 was on a 2 game win streak so their mmr jumped to a master tier level

> [{quoted}](name=420 grams,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vFljwA7g,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-22T20:22:46.160+0000)
>
> But maybe the level 25 was on a 2 game win streak so their mmr jumped to a master tier level

*COUGH*
The match making system is shit.....but are you a brand new lvl 25 player or is this an alt account? Big difference.
Censor the names from your post.  It's only polite.

> [{quoted}](name=Selegun,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vFljwA7g,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-22T20:24:10.598+0000)
>
> Censor the names from your post.  It's only polite.

Usually that is more for the calling people out. In this context it lets people actually look the champions up to see what is being stated.
Good to know, though I'd personally air the side of caution when dealing with the internet.

Leveling new accounts has become cancer. I always level an alt once a year to test it out before I tell friends to start playing, and yes I still get new players to join. After my last friend joined in 2015 I haven't felt like recruiting anyone. The system for new players is so bad.
